'''1.2.2''' is a minor update to {{JE}} released on March 1, 2012,<ref>{{cite|url= https://web.archive.org/web/20120302113924/http://www.mojang.com/2012/03/minecraft-1-2-is-out//||title=Minecraft 1.2 is Out!|author=Jens Bergensten|website=Mojang.com|date=March 1, 2012}}</ref> to fix issues where some naturally generated features were not appearing in [[Java Edition 1.2.1|1.2.1]].

== Fixes ==
'''3 bugs fixed'''
* Fixed generation of birch, spruce, tall oak and swamp trees.
* Fixed generation of [[giant mushroom]]s.
* [[Snow]] now appears on [[map]]s again.</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 1.2.2 is the first minor client version in the full release of ''Java Edition''.
